SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class GameHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.GameHandler
public class GameHandler extends Object
Handles the match, controller and game. It's a middle man between server and controller. It dispatches also the actions, received from the client, to the controller.

    • lobby

      public void lobby(CSConnection connection) throws InterruptedException
      This is the lobby. Here the players wait for other players to connect, in order to reach the number chosen from the games's host.
      Parameters:
      connection - Already created connection between client-server
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - thrown if an error occurs during thread sleep.

    • suspendClient

      public void suspendClient(int ID)
      Suspend the selected client after a disconnection. It acts on controller. The player can reconnect and restore the game.
      Parameters:
      ID - Unique ID of the player to be suspended.
      See Also:
      • restoreClient(int)

    • restoreClient

      public void restoreClient(int ID)
      Restore the selected client after a disconnection and a reconnection. It acts on controller.
      Parameters:
      ID - Unique ID of the player that was suspended
      See Also:
      • suspendClient(int)

    • setNumOfPlayers

      public void setNumOfPlayers(VirtualPlayer player, int numOfPlayers) throws OutOfBoundException
      Verify if the number of players chosen by the player is in the possible range.
      Parameters:
      player - player that send to the server the request to set the number of players.
      numOfPlayers - number of players in the game.
      Throws:
      OutOfBoundException - thrown if the range of players is not correct.
